  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770205363</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Transplanting a Tradition: Li Huayi</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Verpflanzen einer Tradition: Li Huayi</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Transplantation d'une tradition : Li Huayi</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Transplanting uma tradição: Li Huayi</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Trapianto della tradizione: Li Huayi</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μεταμόσχευση μιας παράδοσης: Λι Huayi</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Trasplante de una tradición: Li Huayi</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Li Huayi, a painter of propaganda posters during the Cultural Revolution, reinvigorate the centuries-old tradition of Chinese landscape painting with his own, wholly contemporary vision. This Educator Guide explores the Chinese Cultural Revolution and Landscape Painting as well as contemporary painting.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Arts</string>
          </keyword>
          <coverage>
            <string language="en">North America</string>
          </coverage>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Li Huayi, ein Maler der Propagandaplakate während
der kulturellen Umdrehung,  beleben die Jahrhundert-alte 
Tradition des chinesischen Landschaftsanstriches mit seinen Selbst, 
insgesamt zeitgenössischer Anblick neu. Diese 
Erzieher-Anleitung erforscht die chinesische kulturelle Umdrehung und 
den Landschaftsanstrich sowie zeitgenössischen Anstrich.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le Li Huayi, un peintre des affiches de propagande
pendant la révolution culturelle, revigorent la siècle-vieille 
tradition de la peinture chinoise d'horizontal avec ses propres, 
complètement vision contemporaine. Ce guide d'éducateur 
explore la révolution et la peinture culturelles chinoises 
d'horizontal aussi bien que la peinture contemporaine.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Li Huayi, um pintor de posteres do propaganda 
durante a volta cultural, reinvigorate a tradição século-velha da 
pintura chinesa com seus próprios, completamente visão contemporary 
da paisagem. Esta guia do educador explora a volta e a pintura 
cultural chinesas da paisagem as.well.as a pintura contemporary.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Li Huayi, un pittore dei manifesti di propaganda 
durante la rivoluzione culturale, reinvigorate la secolo-vecchia 
tradizione della pittura cinese con il suoi propri, interamente 
visione contemporanea di paesaggio. Questa guida dell'educatore 
esplora la rivoluzione e la pittura culturali cinesi di paesaggio
così come la pittura contemporanea.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το λι Huayi, ένας ζωγράφος των αφισών προπαγάνδας 
κατά τη διάρκεια της πολιτιστικής επανάστασης, αναζωογονεί την 
αιώνας-παλαιά παράδοση κινεζικού τοπίου χρωματίζοντας με δικών 
δικοί του, πλήρως σύγχρονο όραμα. Αυτός ο οδηγός 
εκπαιδευτικών ερευνά την κινεζική πολιτιστική ζωγραφική 
επαναστάσεων και τοπίων καθώς επίσης και τη σύγχρονη ζωγραφική.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Li Huayi, pintor de los carteles de la propaganda 
durante la revolución cultural, reinvigorate la siglo-vieja 
tradición de la pintura china con sus el propios, enteramente visión
contemporánea del paisaje. Esta guía del educador explora la 
revolución y la pintura culturales chinas del paisaje así como la 
pintura contemporánea.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Menschlichkeit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>

          </keyword>
